name: Create order with invalid ingredient hash
description: This test verifies that an order creation attempt with an invalid ingredient hash returns a 500 Internal Server Error.
descriptionHtml: This test verifies that an order creation attempt with an invalid ingredient hash returns a 500 Internal Server Error.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: User creation failed
assert False
statusTrace:
@pytest.fixture
    def create_user():
        payload = User.register_new_user()
    
        requests.delete(config.DELETE_USER_PATH, json=payload)
    
        response = requests.post(config.CREATE_USER_PATH, json=payload)
    
        if response.status_code != 200:
            print(f"User creation failed with status code {response.status_code}")
            print(f"Response body: {response.json()}")
>           assert False, "User creation failed"
